name: Mechanized Mutiny
description:
//Controls//

WASD -Movement

Arrow Keys-Attack

Holding Space bar and an Arrow Key - Fires an EMP stun attack

E- Opens menus

Collect bolts from each robot you destroy to buy upgrades in the hub area.

//About Me//

Hello ! My name is Noah I'm 18 and I've been interested in indie game development for as long as I can remember, Mechanized Mutiny is my first completed project that I am publishing and I am proud to say that I am entirely self taught and all the game's assets where created by me. 

Thank you so much for playing my game, I encourage you to leave feedback in the comments and maybe send a dollar or two my way as I'd sincerely appreciate it and I'd love to devote my self to indie game development full time! I have countless ideas for awesome games that I'd love to create and I learned so much just from doing this one project, I can't wait to get started on the next one !  

:)
